pageContext.claim: “[Brett Kavanaugh is] a man that was caught up in a hoax that was set up by the Democrats, using the Democrats' lawyers.”
pageContext.analysis: Christine Blasey Ford said she decided to come forward with an allegation that Kavanaugh sexually assaulted her in 1982 only after a confidential letter she sent to her congresswoman leaked this year. “I am no one’s pawn,” Ford testified before the Senate Judiciary Committee on Sept. 27. Trump at first called Ford’s testimony credible. But once the Senate confirmed Kavanaugh to the Supreme Court, the president without evidence called the whole thing a “a hoax that was set up by the Democrats using the Democrats’ lawyers.”
